67 #define WAIT1_NofCyclesMs(ms, hz) ((ms)*((hz)/1000)) /* calculates the needed cycles based on bus clock frequency */
68 #define WAIT1_NofCyclesUs(us, hz) ((us)*(((hz)/1000)/1000)) /* calculates the needed cycles based on bus clock frequency */
69 #define WAIT1_NofCyclesNs(ns, hz) (((ns)*(((hz)/1000)/1000))/1000) /* calculates the needed cycles based on bus clock frequency */
70 
71 
72 #define WAIT1_WAIT_C(cycles) \
73  ( (cycles)<=10 ? \
74  WAIT1_Wait10Cycles() \
75  : WAIT1_WaitCycles((uint16_t)cycles) \
76  )

114 void WAIT1_Waitms(uint16_t ms);
115 /*
116 ** ===================================================================
117 ** Method : WAIT1_Waitms (component Wait)
118 ** Description :
119 ** Wait for a specified time in milliseconds.
120 ** Parameters :
121 ** NAME - DESCRIPTION
122 ** ms - How many milliseconds the function has to
123 ** wait
124 ** Returns : Nothing
125 ** ===================================================================
126 */
127 
128 /* we are having a static clock configuration: implement as macro/inlined version */
129 #define WAIT1_Waitus(us) \
130  ( ((WAIT1_NofCyclesUs((us),CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)==0)||(us)==0) ? \
131  (void)0 : \
132  ( ((us)/1000)==0 ? (void)0 : WAIT1_Waitms((uint16_t)((us)/1000))) \
133  , (WAIT1_NofCyclesUs(((us)%1000), CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)==0) ? (void)0 : \
134  WAIT1_WAIT_C(WAIT1_NofCyclesUs(((us)%1000), CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)) \
135  )
136 /*
137 ** ===================================================================
138 ** Method : WAIT1_Waitus (component Wait)
139 ** Description :
140 ** Wait for a specified time in microseconds.
141 ** Parameters :
142 ** NAME - DESCRIPTION
143 ** us - How many microseconds the function has to
144 ** wait
145 ** Returns : Nothing
146 ** ===================================================================
147 */
148 
149 /* we are having a static clock configuration: implement as macro/inlined version */
150 #define WAIT1_Waitns(ns) \
151  ( ((WAIT1_NofCyclesNs((ns), CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)==0)||(ns)==0) ? \
152  (void)0 : \
153  WAIT1_Waitus((ns)/1000) \
154  , (WAIT1_NofCyclesNs((ns)%1000, CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)==0) ? \
155  (void)0 : \
156  WAIT1_WAIT_C(WAIT1_NofCyclesNs(((ns)%1000), CPU_BUS_CLK_HZ)) \
157  )
158 /*
159 ** ===================================================================
160 ** Method : WAIT1_Waitns (component Wait)
161 ** Description :
162 ** Wait for a specified time in nano seconds.
163 ** Parameters :
164 ** NAME - DESCRIPTION
165 ** ns - How many ns the function has to wait
166 ** Returns : Nothing
167 ** ===================================================================
168 */
169 
170 #define WAIT1_WaitOSms(ms) \
171  WAIT1_Waitms(ms) /* no RTOS used, so use normal wait */
172 /*
173 ** ===================================================================
174 ** Method : WAIT1_WaitOSms (component Wait)
175 ** Description :
176 ** If an RTOS is enabled, this routine will use a non-blocking
177 ** wait method. Otherwise it will do a busy/blocking wait.
178 ** Parameters : None
179 ** Returns : Nothing
180 ** ===================================================================
181 */
182
